ViewObject.Name: XxcsoBm3BankAccountFullVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT XxcsoBankAccountsEO.BANK_ACCOUNT_ID AS bank_account_id, xxcso_010003j_pkg.decode_bm_info( xdc.supplier_id ,xcm.status ,xcm.cooperate_flag ,xcm.batch_proc_status ,DECODE(xdc.belling_details_div,'4',NULL,XxcsoBankAccountsEO.BANK_NUMBER) ,DECODE(pvs.attribute4,'4',NULL,xbav.bank_number) ) AS bank_number, xxcso_010003j_pkg.decode_bm_info( xdc.supplier_id ,xcm.status ,xcm.cooperate_flag ,xcm.batch_proc_status ,DECODE(xdc.belling_details_div,'4',NULL,XxcsoBankAccountsEO.BANK_NAME) ,DECODE(pvs.attribute4,'4',NULL,xbav.bank_name) ) AS bank_name, xxcso_010003j_pkg.decode_bm_info( xdc.supplier_id ,xcm.status ,xcm.cooperate_flag ,xcm.batch_proc_status ,DECODE(xdc.belling_details_div,'4',NULL,XxcsoBankAccountsEO.BRANCH_NUMBER) ,DECODE(pvs.attribute4,'4',NULL,xbav.bank_num) ) AS branch_number, xxcso_010003j_pkg.decode_bm_info( xdc.supplier_id ,xcm.status ,xcm.cooperate_flag ,xcm.batch_proc_status ,DECODE(xdc.belling_details_div,'4',NULL,XxcsoBankAccountsEO.BRANCH_NAME) ,DECODE(pvs.attribute4,'4',NULL,xbav.bank_branch_name) ) AS branch_name, xxcso_010003j_pkg.decode_bm_info( xdc.supplier_id ,xcm.status ,xcm.cooperate_flag ,xcm.batch_proc_status ,DECODE(xdc.belling_details_div,'4',NULL,XxcsoBankAccountsEO.BANK_ACCOUNT_TYPE) ,DECODE(pvs.attribute4,'4',NULL,xbav.bank_account_type) ) AS bank_account_type, xxcso_010003j_pkg.decode_bm_info( xdc.supplier_id ,xcm.status ,xcm.cooperate_flag ,xcm.batch_proc_status ,DECODE(xdc.belling_details_div,'4',NULL,XxcsoBankAccountsEO.BANK_ACCOUNT_NUMBER) ,DECODE(pvs.attribute4,'4',NULL,xbav.bank_account_num) ) AS bank_account_number, xxcso_010003j_pkg.decode_bm_info( xdc.supplier_id ,xcm.status ,xcm.cooperate_flag ,xcm.batch_proc_status ,DECODE(xdc.belling_details_div,'4',NULL,XxcsoBankAccountsEO.BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME_KANA) ,DECODE(pvs.attribute4,'4',NULL,xbav.account_holder_name_alt) ) AS bank_account_name_kana, xxcso_010003j_pkg.decode_bm_info( xdc.supplier_id ,xcm.status ,xcm.cooperate_flag ,xcm.batch_proc_status ,DECODE(xdc.belling_details_div,'4',NULL,XxcsoBankAccountsEO.BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME_KANJI) ,DECODE(pvs.attribute4,'4',NULL,xbav.account_holder_name) ) AS bank_account_name_kanji, XxcsoBankAccountsEO.BANK_ACCOUNT_DUMMY_FLAG, XxcsoBankAccountsEO.CREATED_BY, XxcsoBankAccountsEO.CREATION_DATE, XxcsoBankAccountsEO.LAST_UPDATED_BY, XxcsoBankAccountsEO.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, XxcsoBankAccountsEO.LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, XxcsoBankAccountsEO.REQUEST_ID, XxcsoBankAccountsEO.PROGRAM_APPLICATION_ID, XxcsoBankAccountsEO.PROGRAM_ID, XxcsoBankAccountsEO.PROGRAM_UPDATE_DATE, XxcsoBankAccountsEO.DELIVERY_ID FROM XXCSO_BANK_ACCOUNTS XxcsoBankAccountsEO ,xxcso_destinations xdc ,xxcso_contract_managements xcm ,xxcso_bank_accts_v xbav ,po_vendor_sites pvs WHERE xdc.delivery_id = XxcsoBankAccountsEO.DELIVERY_ID AND xcm.contract_management_id = xdc.contract_management_id AND xbav.vendor_id(+) = xdc.supplier_id AND pvs.vendor_id(+) = xdc.supplier_id
